sections.heading: Rental; accrues to temporary school fund
sections.text: The Board of Educational Lands and Funds shall place all money received for rental of saline lands in the temporary school fund of the state, subject to the law governing such temporary school fund.SourceLaws 1889, c. 94, ยง 6, p. 582;Laws 1893, c. 22, ยง 2, p.
